title: A Reason to Stay
description: A stand-alone novella in the Oak Hollow Series. Ellie loves her hometown, job, and her best friend Jake. But Jake is a ladies man that will never settle down. Ellie canâ€™t stand to see him with other women anymore, so she is packing up and leaving Oak Hollow and everything she loves to start over. A night of unexpected passion makes her start to think maybe things can work out between them, until she happens upon a secret Jake has been keeping for more than a year. Will their friendship be forever torn apart? Or will Ellie find A Reason to Stay?
author: June Stevens Westerfield
